summary: This is an email from August 26, 2019, regarding seating arrangements for an upcoming Epstein hearing. The sender indicates the ADIC (Assistant Director in Charge) plans to attend and asks if the recipient also plans to attend to adjust seating needs accordingly.

events.title: Epstein Hearing
events.description: A hearing related to the Jeffrey Epstein case was scheduled for the day after this email was sent.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 26, 2019, and discusses an Epstein hearing scheduled for the following day.
The Assistant Director in Charge (ADIC) of an unspecified agency planned to attend the hearing.
The email is a logistical communication about reserving seating for the ADIC and potentially others from the sender's organization.
